title: Esty Deez
creator_contributor_role: New South Wales. Dept. of Health, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Sexually transmitted diseases
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Sexually transmitted diseases
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Safe sex in AIDS prevention
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Sex instruction for teenagers
description: A frank look at the importance of using condoms to prevent sexually transmited diseases. Discusses the dangers of having multiple sexual partners and what should be done if an STD is contracted. Depicts the behaviour of adolescents together with contemporary language to ensure the attention of the intended audience. NB: TEACHER PREVIEW PRIOR TO CLASSROOM VIEWING IS RECOMMENDED.
